segments.text: Here is your ticket . Let's get in the museum .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . The exhibits on display were really fascinating .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't agree more . I think we'd better hire a guide so that we can learn more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Let's ask the officer for help .
segments.speaker: S2
